question: Consider a linear homogeneous recurrence relation whose characteristic equation is (x - 3)(x + 2) = 0. Which expression characterizes the set of all solutions to the recurrence relation? The variables s and t can be any real numbers.
explanation:
Correct

The solutions to the characteristic equation are x = 3 and x = -2. Therefore the solutions are a linear combination of 3 n and (-2) n .
